==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|問|屋}}

===Etymology 1===
/tohiya/: [topiya] > [toɸiya] > [towiya] > [toiya]. The adverbial of {{m|ja|問ふ||ask|tr=tohu}} ''/tohi/'' and {{m|ja|屋||store|tr=ya}}.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|といや|hhira=とひや}}

# a place for merchants to sleep
#* 1597: Ekirin [[w:Setsuyōshū|Setsuyōshū]] (page 39)
#*: '''問屋''' (トヒヤ) 商人宿
# a wholesaler; also, such a store

===Etymology 2===
From [[問屋|toiya]].

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とんや}}

# a wholesaler; also, such a store
